title: 21p Land Overlooking Diyawanna Lake and Bird Santuary
details:
21p prime plot of land Overlooking Diyawanna Lake and Bird santuary
for sale at Duwa Road, Beddagana, Kotte
Situated in high residential and well developing area
Facing 20ft wide road
Rs. 2.2mn pp
Anyone can buy entire block or 11p block
